text: CLOSE The Teen Wolf actor gives a tour of the 2017 Mountain Dew Spiked Lemonade MTV Beach House which has returned to the Jersey Shore this year in Loveladies. The cast of the new ` ` MTV Floribama Shore'' ( Photo : MTV ) It ’ s “ Jersey Shore ” — the next chapter. “ MTV Floribama Shore, ” billed as a return of the network ’ s “ Shore ” franchise, debuts 10 p. m. Monday, Nov. 27 on MTV. “ Different shore, same shenanigans, ” says MTV. “ Get ready for all the drama, mayhem, and hookups, brought to you from the party capital that is Panama City Beach. ” More :'Jersey Shore'reunion : We were a'hot mess'in Seas
